About Me

Let me introduce myself.

BIO

My Name is Ruaraidh Canaway and i am a recent University graduate looking to make my impact on the programming world, I achieved a Bsc(Hons) in Computer Games Application Development at Abertay University. Despite studying a games programming course, games is not where my passion lies, I love the art of programming itself and am looking for a career that truly lets me explore the limits of programming.
